item.title: Talk about Go: How to custom build a gateway interceptor in Gin framwork
item.description: Middleware often used as a level “security check”, for core components such as request header/request body verification, caching, and current limiting.

item.title: Before talking about the Gin web framework, let's take a look at httprouter
item.description: The etymology of Gin a strong alcohol, comes from the Netherlands.
